short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Facebook™ Livestream - ENHANCE and SPEED UP the your viewing Facebook live stream for slow internet connection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Facebook™ Livestream - ENHANCE and SPEED UP the your viewing Facebook live stream for slow internet connection.

To order to do that, Like Enhance YouTube™ Livestream, Enhance™ Facebook Livestream will:
* Stop every requests unnecessary and affect to live stream quality.

HOW TO USE: 
- Because, while Enhance™ Facebook Livestream is activating, you can not access to other website. 
- Just click to Enhance™ Facebook Livestream ICON at the toolbar to deactivate.
- Anytime you want to focus to live stream, just click again Enhance™ Facebook Livestream ICON to re-activate.
